name: com.castsoftware.nosqldotnet
title: NoSQL for .Net
description: NoSQL support extension for .Net provides official support for MongoDB,DynamoDB,CosmosDB, Memcached, Couchbase and Elasticsearch. The calculation of Function Points for your .NET analyzes using MongoDB, DynamoDB, CosmosDB, Memcached, Couchbase and Elasticsearch will be improved through the creation of new objects and links specific to MongoDB, DynamoDB, CosmosDB, Memcached, Couchbase and Elasticsearch therefore the links from .Net to the database objects will be created. The extension also provides new quality rules concerning the best practices and the detections of risks related to the use of MongoDB.
